It belongs to the Zingiberaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like ginger and turmeric. The plant is characterized by its striking, dark green, strap-like leaves and its delicate, fragrant inflorescences. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
